CloudCoder - Getting Started
Home | Screenshots | Getting Started | Demo Server | Exercise Repository | Contributing
Please note: This site is a work in progress, and information may be incomplete or inaccurate. CloudCoder development is progressing rapidly, and it should be ready for wider use in September, 2012. If you're interested in becoming an early adopter now, email dhovemey@ycp.edu.

This page has information on getting started with CloudCoder.

Note: the documentation is a work in progress.

If you are considering adopting CloudCoder for your course and would like to try it out, you can request an account on our demo server.

Here is the process for setting up your own CloudCoder installation:

  1. Provision the servers
  2. Build the CloudCoder software
  3. Deploy the CloudCoder software
  4. Create a course and add student accounts
  5. Add problems
